content.question: The third stanza (lines 9-12) differs stylistically from the rest of the poem in which of the following ways?

choices.label: It relies chiefly on the use of imagery, conveying the vividness of a particular sensory experience.
It does not employ figurative language, highlighting the immediacy of an observation.
It presents an ironic statement, suggesting the complexity of the speakerâ€™s experience.
Its syntax extends beyond the end of the stanza, emphasizing the power of a particular impression.

content.answer: Its syntax extends beyond the end of the stanza, emphasizing the power of a particular impression.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
